author: Home Repair Tutor
description: How to waterproof DITRA Peel and Stick…when toilets overflow it’s disgusting. One way to stop water damage is to waterproof the floor as much as possible. I use prefab KERECK corners and KERDI-BAND against the walls. I also waterproof DITRA seams. Then I silicone the toilet against the tile floor when it’s installed. Many thanks to @schlutersystems1 for sponsoring this tutorial and providing materials for my client’s remodel 👍🏽🔥#ditra #powderroom #bathroomremodel #diy #schlutersystems #brandpartner
title: How to Waterproof DITRA Peel and Stick - #shorts #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
